text: Zoltán Lakner (born 8 August 1975, Budapest) is a political scientist, social politician and journalist.https://www.greeneuropeanjournal.eu/article- author/zoltan-lakner/ Lakner lectures at the Department of Social Policy of the Faculty of Social Sciences of Eötvös Loránd University. Since 2001 he has been a board member of the Hilscher Rezső Social Policy Association. From 2016 to 2019, Lakner was a journalist and deputy editor-in-chief of 168 Hour weekly (168 Óra). From May 2020, Lakner writes as a journalist for Present. ==References== ==Other websites== * "A political scientist is a celebrity, an actor is not" * Interview for Budapest Pride Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Hungarian journalists
title: Zoltán Lakner
